components.description:
The silver nib of a fountain pen, which distributes ink onto a writing surface. Positioned at a 45° angle, with its tip at the lower left or right. Like üñãÔ∏è Fountain Pen, commonly used for various content concerning writing, drawing, and signing (e.g., laws, deals, in sports).

Several platforms, including Google, Microsoft, and Samsung, depict only a nib, sometimes ringed with gold. Other platforms, including Apple and Twitter, feature the same designs as their üñãÔ∏è Fountain Pen, but with their tips angled to the lower right.
components.title: Black Nib

description:

title: Black Nib

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: The nib of a quill, or fountain pen. Black Nib was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste th http://emojipedia.org/black-nib/
emoji_net_data.name: black nib

bn:13603371a: Belonging to, or sold by, a stationer.

bn:00085489v: To construct by mental labor; to think up; particularly, to produce or create a literary or musical work.
To write, especially a literary or artistic work; to compose
To produce or create a literary or musical work.
To construct by mental labor; to think up.

bn:00057603n: A nib is the part of a quill, dip pen or fountain pen which comes into contact with the writing surface in order to deposit ink.
The writing point of a pen
A part of a quill, dip pen or fountain pen
The tip of a pen or tool that touches the surface.

bn:00036081n: Pen containing a reservoir of ink.
A pen containing a reservoir of ink, which is fed to a writing nib automatically.
A pen that is supplied with ink from a reservoir in its barrel
A fountain pen is a nib pen that, unlike its predecessor the dip pen, contains an internal reservoir of water-based liquid ink.
A pen with a refillable reservoir that provides a continuous supply of fluid ink to its point.
A fountain pen in which the ink is drawn from replaceable cartridges.

bn:00081714n: Graphism of symbols such as letters that express some meaning.
Writing is a medium of communication that represents language through the inscription of signs and symbols.
Representation of language in a textual medium
Written letters or symbols that express some meaning.
Writing is the representation of language in a textual medium through the use of a set of signs or symbols.
A system of characters used to write one or several languages.
Letters or symbols that are written or imprinted on a surface to represent the sounds or words of a language

bn:00061314n: A tool, originally made from a feather but now usually a small tubular instrument, containing ink used to write or make marks.
A pen is a writing implement used to apply ink to a surface, usually paper, for writing or drawing.
A writing implement with a point from which ink flows
A utensil, usually tubular in form, containing ink used to write or make marks.
